about_the_game:
Important:

• If you already have the WZ-122 TM, you will receive 3,250 gold as compensation.
• If you already have the Flamedragon legendary camouflage, you will receive 3,200 gold as compensation.

This bundle includes:

• WZ-122 TM Premium tank (China, medium, Tier VIII)
• Garage slot
• 9 equipment slots
• Flamedragon legendary camouflage for the WZ-122 TM
• Pot of Plenty attachment
• 10 Rare Combat XP boosters
• 10 Rare Credit boosters
• Flaming Dragon legendary avatar

The WZ-122 TM is a medium by type, but a heavy at heart. Compared to most mediums, this tank's strong armor withstands enemy fire with more confidence, while its powerful gun deals sizable damage in return.

This DLC bundle can only be added to your World of Tanks Blitz account once.
